tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Spain is a diverse country, with distinct regional cultures, languages like Catalan and Basque, and a rich heritage seen in its art, architecture, and traditions.

tidbits.title: Tapas and Cuisine
tidbits.description: The country is renowned for its delicious cuisine, especially tapas, a wide variety of small dishes often enjoyed with drinks, showcasing Spain's culinary creativity.

tidbits.title: Historical Landmarks
tidbits.description: Spain boasts remarkable historical landmarks such as the Sagrada Familia in Barcelona, Alhambra in Granada, and the ancient city of Toledo, reflecting its rich history.
